channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Machine and me

item.title: Launch of machineand.me project
item.description: First launch On May 20, 2019 we registered the domain machineand.me. The mission of the company at that time was to make it easier for developers to work. We set goals for the optimization and automation of tasks and processes. We wanted to build our own DevOps stack. But the growth of our competences made us realize that our solutions were not flexible. That’s when we started looking for new missions and making new plans.
